title:
Brezis--Browder type results for Fractional Sobolev spaces and
  applications
abstract:
In this paper we prove Brezis--Browder type results for homogeneous
fractional Sobolev spaces $\mathring{H}^s(\R^d)$ and quantitive type estimates
for $s$--harmonic functions.
  We further relate such outcomes with the question of whether a linear and
continuous functional $T$ defined on $\mathring{H}^s(\R^d)$ admits (up to a
constant) an integral representation of its norm in terms of the Coulomb type
energy
  $$\|T\|^2_{\mathring{H}^{-s}(\R^d)}=\int_{\R^d}\int_{\R^d}\frac{T(x)T(y)}{|x-y|^{d-2s}}dx
dy. $$
